post.text: Hillary and Al Gore are live from Miami speaking about why we have to act on climate change. Watch live:

comment.author: Connor
comment.text: Climate change happens every day it literally just dropped one degree.. technically that's climate change. It's not a big issue like these two make it out to be..

replies.author: Connor
replies.text: look if a volcano exploded it would create 10,000 more times the co2 components than humans have created since the beginning of time.

replies.author: Jordan
replies.text: Please read Al Gore's last book The Future: you will find out differently.

replies.author: Sydney
replies.text: Oh Lord! Wonder if the dinosaurs feel the same way! Oh wait they are all dead!

replies.author: Connor
replies.text: Jordan that's his opinion just like what I said is mine. Except my statement about co2 that was proven.

replies.author: Connor
replies.text: Sydney because co2 emissions caused a meteor right...
